papers.title: Opening & Welcome
papers.abstract: The CNPEM Director General Antonio José Roque da Silva and the LNLS Director Harry Westfahl Jr. welcome you to the 9th International Beam Instrumentation Conference. Watch a tour through CNPEM’s four national laboratories and take a look inside Sirius’s storage ring tunnel and beamlines under commissioning and under construction. Your browser cannot play the video. Consider download from Link Address.
